00025 #include <aeryn/test_runner.hpp>
00026 #include <aeryn/is_equal.hpp>
00027 #include <aeryn/use_name.hpp>

00039 void TestForTheMeaningOfLife()
00040 {
00041         const int theMeaningofLife = 42;
00042         IS_EQUAL( theMeaningofLife, 42 );
00043 }
00044 
00057 int main()
00058 {
00059         using namespace Aeryn;
00060         TestRunner testRunner;
00061         testRunner.Add( TestCase( USE_NAME( TestForTheMeaningOfLife ) ) );
00062         return testRunner.Run();
